subject: Re: TangoVoice OpenAPI Schema - Confirmed Working
body:
## CONFIRMED: TangoVoice Schema Updated

Tested the API - date filtering works:
```
GET /api/events?appId=1&start=2026-01-06&end=2026-01-12&active=true
```
Returns events including Milongas, Practicas, Classes.

## TangoVoice Schema Status
Already updated with:
- `start`/`end` params (not startDate/endDate)
- `active` param with default 'true'
- `categoryId` with hardcoded ObjectIds enum

## Known Issue
Category filter returns empty - the categoryId doesn't match categoryFirstId in MongoDB. Events have categoryFirstId but we query categoryId.

Fix needed in Events.js:
```javascript
if (categoryId) {
    filter.categoryFirstId = categoryId;
}
```

Or use $or to check all three category fields.

## Next Steps
1. Once categoryId filter is fixed, TangoVoice GPT will work fully
2. Schema is ready at: https://github.com/ybotman/TangoVoice

Thanks for the backend update!

-- Cronas (TangoVoice)
